Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Caps the amount of collectible rent increases due to major capital improvements at six percent of the legal regulated rent
Summary: Caps the amount of collectible rent increases due to major capital improvements at six percent of the legal regulated rent.
LawCode: Amd §6, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to capping the amount of collectible rent increases due to major capital improvements at six percent of the legal regulated rent
